mapper.select: select est.codigo,est.nombre,est.correo,est.telefono,est.identificacion,est.tipo_id,acu.nombre AS acu_nombre,acu.cedula AS acu_cedula,acu.correo AS acu_correo,acu.telefono AS acu_telefono,con.nombre AS con_nombre,con.codigo AS con_codigo, con.correo AS con_correo,pl.Carrera AS pl_Carrera,pl.ID AS pl_ID,pl.Grafo AS pl_Grafo,pl.creditos AS pl_creditos,pl.nummaterias AS pl_nummaterias,mac.Materia AS mac_Materia,maa.Materia AS maa_Materia,sol.id AS sol_id, sol.fecha AS sol_fecha,sol.estado AS sol_estado, sol.justificacion AS sol_justificacion,sol.comentario AS sol_comentario,sol.avalAcudiente AS sol_avalAcudiente,sol.avalConsejero AS sol_avalConsejero,sol.Materia AS sol_Materia from Estudiante AS est Join Acudiente AS acu ON est.Acudiente=acu.cedula JOIN Consejero AS con ON est.consejero=con.codigo JOIN Plan_de_Estudio as pl ON (est.Plan_ID=pl.ID) JOIN MateriasCursadas AS mac ON est.codigo=mac.Estudiante JOIN MateriasActuales AS maa ON est.codigo=maa.Estudiante JOIN solicitud_de_cancelacion AS sol ON est.solicitudCancelacion=sol.id WHERE est.codigo=#{ide}
